
## Water Surface

```{r water-surface, echo = FALSE}
# expects parameters file1, file2, type1, type2
ws1 = read_ws(file1, type1)
ws2 = read_ws(file2, type2)
ws.diff = diff_ws(ws1, ws2)
ws.rmse.station = rmse_ws(ws.diff, "Station")
ws.rmse.time = rmse_ws(ws.diff, "Time")

ws.diff %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = diff_ws) + geom_boxplot() +
  ylab("Difference") +
  ggtitle("Water Surface Differences at Stations")
ws.rmse.station %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = rmse_ws) +
  geom_col() + ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("Water Surface RMSE at Stations")
ws.rmse.time %>% mutate(Time = as.POSIXct(Time, format = "%d%b%Y %M:%S",
    tz = "UTC")) %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Time, y = rmse_ws) + geom_line() +
  scale_x_datetime(date_labels = "%b %Y") + 
  ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("Water Surface RMSE Through Time")
```
